item.title: Contact Me
item.description: Please find here a list of places where you can find me: Contacts email: info@websiteauthor.co.uk main website: websiteauthor.co.uk Social Media Instagram Linkedin YouTube Twitter Return to Home

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name’s Edwin. I’m a developer, designer and software engineer, but I just love making websites for people. Sometimes for their own personal use or for their business, or maybe because they’re bored and why not have a website anyway. Long story short, I have helped numerous friends and clients who came to me with horrendous (ok, slightly unappealing) looking sites and shook them (the sites) round a bit in the hope that something better could be made out of them.
